lead_paragraph: WALLER--Allen C. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished longtime member, Allen Waller. To his family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. The beautiful qualities of his life shall endure forever. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WALLER, ALLEN C
